SELECT u.nickname AS name, u.photo, d.dept_name AS deptName, ck.address, CASE WHEN ck.`status` = 1 THEN '正常' WHEN ck.`status` = 2 THEN '中风险' WHEN ck.`status` = 3 THEN '高风险' END AS risk, DATE_FORMAT(ck.create_time,'%H:%i') AS checkinTime, ck.date FROM tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_checkin ck ON u.id = ck.user_id and ck.date = CURRENT_DATE LEFT JOIN tb_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.id
u.id = #{userId} and u.status = 1
